Title: Samero
Description: ['Short film from animator Tsuji Naoyuki, who is known for his use of both charcoal and puppet animation.  Wake Up is a dark and brooding animation epitomizing his story telling style by combining serene worlds and childlike images with darkness and nightmarish scenes.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar', 'Side story: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar: Furoagari no Kabe ni Kaketa Seishun - One More Centimeter']
